H3.text: who sing say you wo n 't let go. James Arthur

A4.text: Arthur released 'Say You Won't Let Go' on 9 September 2016 as the lead single from his second studio album, Back from the Edge.

A5.text: The album's lead single, titled 'Say You Won't Let Go' and released in September 2016, saw great success, peaking at number 1 on the UK Singles Chart and selling close to 2.7 million copies as of February 2021.
